title: Find all CloudFront Distributions which are configured with Original Failover
query:
select
  -- Required Columns
  arn as resource,
  case
    when origin_groups ->> 'Items' is not null then 'ok'
    else 'alarm'
  end as status,
  case
    when origin_groups ->> 'Items' is not null then title || ' origin group is configured.'
    else title || ' origin group not configured.'
  end as reason,
  -- Additional Dimensions
  region,
  account_id
from
  aws_cloudfront_distribution
